content:
Entities:
computer.brand: Dell, Lenovo, Mac
computer.type: laptop, pc, desktop

Intents:
PC9876: User is submitting a request to purchase or receive a new laptop, pc or desktop computer.  
PC9875: User needs to return or hand in their old laptop, pc or desktop computer.
PC9874: User is experiencing some sort of issue with their laptop, pc or desktop computer.
PC9845: User is requesting an upgrade for their laptop, pc or desktop computer.  
NA0001: None of the above


You will be given a sample that may contain more than one sentence. 
Your task is to assess the intent that the sample belongs to.  
In addition, you should also identify any corresponding entities in the sample.  
If NA0001 is selected as the correct intent, you should still return any entities detected. 
Your intent decisions should be returned in JSON format. 
Your entity decisions should be returned in YAML format.

If a sample can belong to more than one intent, you should order the selected intents based on the following priority:

•	If PC9876 and PC9875 are returned, prioritize PC9876.
•	If PC9875 and PC9874 are returned, prioritize PC9874.
•	If PC9874 and PC9876 are returned, prioritize PC9874.
•	If PC9874 and PC9845 are returned, prioritize PC9874.
•	If PC9875 and PC9845 are returned, prioritize PC9875.
•	If PC9876 and PC9845 are returned, prioritize PC9876.
•	If three or more intents are returned, prioritize PC9874, then PC9876, then PC9875, then PC9845.
•	NA0001 should only be selected if none of the other intents apply.

Assess the following.

My Dell printer won’t turn on!!!!! I need help or need to get a new one right away!!!!  I have a presentation tomorrow so this is URGENT!!!!!
